src:
BTS treats fans with slew of preview cuts for '2020 Season's Greetings' packages
04 Nov 2019, 16:14 by sl278



Christmas must have come early because BTS is treating fans to a bunch of preview cuts from their 'Seasons Greetings 2020' package!
'Season's Greetings' is an annual package containing planners and a behind the scenes DVD, a gift to prepare fans for the new year. The preview cuts show off the boys' handsome looks and charm.
Check out all the images below!
